name: Yibiao Yang
content: Yibiao YANG @ Nanjing University (杨已彪-南京大学) 招生信息（本人仅在计算机学院招生） 面向2026年9月入学同学，现有硕士研究生、博士研究生招生名额，欢迎有意向的同学提前联系咨询！ News 12/2024 Congratulations to Maolin(孙茂林) for being awarded the NSFC Young Student Basic Research Program for PhD candidate (国家自然科学基金青年学生基础研究项目-博士研究生)! 11/2025 Our paper on SMT Solver Validation was accepted to ACM ASPLOS! Congratulations to Maolin(孙茂林)! 11/2025 Our paper on Compiler Fault Isolation was accepted to ACM TOSEM! Congratulations to Qingyang(李清扬)! 10/2025 Our paper on Compiler Fault Isolation was accepted to IEEE/ACM ICSE 2026! Congratulations to Qingyang(李清扬) and Maolin(孙茂林)! 08/2025 Our paper on SMT Solver Validation was accepted to ACM OOPSLA 2025! Congratulations to Maolin(孙茂林)! 05/2025 Our paper on Compiler Fault Isolation was accepted to IEEE TSE! 04/2025 Our paper on Compiler Testing was accepted to USENIX ATC 2025! Congratulations to Jiangchang(吴江昶)! 10/2024 Our paper on Debugger Toolchain Validation was accepted to ACM ASPLOS 2025! Ph.D. Students 孙茂林 Maolin Sun (2023.09 - ) 24年国自然青年学生基础研究项目（博士研究生）/25年国家奖学金 吴江昶 Jiangchang Wu (2023.09 - ) 李清扬 Qingyang Li (2024.09 - ) 25年南京大学栋梁特等奖学金 陈康 Kang Chen (2025.09 - ) M.Sc. Students 高宏艳 Hongyan Gao (2023.09 - ) 24年国家奖学金/优秀研究生标兵 闫梦琪 Mengqi Yan (2023.09 - ) 黄一凡 Yifan Huang (2023.09 - ) 朱玉栋 Yudong Zhu (2025.09 - ) 刘轩灵 Xuanling Liu (2025.09 - ) 蒋松言 Songyan Jiang (2025.09 - ) Selected Publications [Full List] Awards 2024 江苏省计算机学会青年科技奖 2018 江苏省优秀博士学位论文 2018 南京大学优秀博士学位论文 Teaching 2025年秋 C语言程序设计基础 (Fundamentals of C Programming) 2024年秋 C语言程序设计基础 (Fundamentals of C Programming) 2023年秋 C语言程序设计基础 (Fundamentals of C Programming) 2022年秋 C语言程序设计基础 (Fundamentals of C Programming)
